com.ephesoft.dcma.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.FileUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUtilCommonConstants

    public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUtilCommonConstants
    This class is a utility file consisting of various APIs related to different functions that can be performed with a file.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

                    java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zout,
                    java.lang.String fileExtension)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method zip the multiple files.
        Parameters:
        dir2zip - String The directory in which file need to zip.
        zout - ZipOutputStream The zipoutput stream.
        fileExtension - String The extension of file which need to zip.
        Throws:
        {@link - IOException}
        java.io.IOException

      • forceDelete

        public static boolean forceDelete(java.io.File fileToBeDeleted)
        Deletes a file. If file is a directory, deletes it and all sub-directories.

        The difference between File.delete() and this method are:

        • A directory to be deleted does not have to be empty.
        • IUtilCommonConstants.DELETE_RETRY_INDEX count of maximum attempts will be made to delete the file
        • An error log will be logged for each unsuccessful attempt to delete the file, but no exception will be thrown.
        Must only be used if the files to be deleted can be left behind in case the deletion is unsuccessful.
        Parameters:
        fileToBeDeleted - file or directory to be deleted.
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the file deletion was successful, false otherwise.

      • waitForFolderModification

        public static void waitForFolderModification(java.io.File folderToCheck,
                             long timeoutLimit)
        Waits for a folder to be modified completely.
        Parameters:
        folderToCheck - directory to be monitored for modification.
        timeoutLimit - for folder-modification.

      • isFileLocked

        public static boolean isFileLocked(java.io.File file)
        Checks if the file whose path is passed as a parameter is used by another process or not. In case parameter is passed as NULL or empty true is returned.

        It internally uses apache FileUtils touch> method. This method will wait for 1 minute for the file to be released by another process otherwise it return true.

        Parameters:
        file - File File to be checked for locking.
        Returns:
        true if file is locked otherwise false.

        newPath - String value containing path of new folder which will replace old folder.

        returns the status of operation as boolean value.

      • createKeyStoreFile

        public static boolean createKeyStoreFile(java.lang.String keyStoreFilePath,
                         char[] password,
                         java.security.KeyStore store)
                                  throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Creates the key store file at the path keyStoreFilePath which is secured by the password and stores the Key store in to the file.
        Parameters:
        keyStoreFilePath - String absolute/Relative path to the key store file
        password - char[] password by which the file is secured
        store - KeyStore that protects the key store file
        Returns:
        boolean true if file is created , otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - when key store key could not be stored
        java.io.IOException - when could not update the file / store the contents of key store at the path
